Urashaka guhagarika VPN ihari? Yego OYA Yego Oya Hitamo Amashusho Tab Sangira Bika Ibindi Nibyo Kureka Hindura urubuga rusanzwe ruremerera kuri \ nintangiriro ya Browser Ongeraho ubushakashatsi bwihariye url uhitemo kandi "Custom \ nsearch moteri" nkuwitanga gushakisha Hitamo moteri yubushakashatsi ukunda cyangwa \ ntegure imwe Kuraho amakuru ya mushakisha yawe cyangwa uhitemo amakuru \ nzahanagurwa mugihe uvuye muri porogaramu Hitamo ibice bigize mushakisha \ n bizatangira Hindura imyitwarire na ui ya porogaramu kugirango \ nureke ibyo ukunda Kugaragaza Akayunguruzo Ikiganiro kirekire kanda ku kimenyetso cyerekana muri rusange. Hitamo akayunguruzo uzakoresha Igenamiterere rya mushakisha, ngaho urashobora bitewe na \ nyour android verisiyo yimpushya. Gushoboza imiyoboro y'urusobekerane, Guhagarika birashobora kuba ingirakamaro \ nto kubika amakuru ya mobile no gutwara urubuga byihuse Emerera imbuga za interineti kugera aho uherereye. Bamwe \ nwebsites {google, amakarita ya nav) bakeneye ubu bushobozi Bika amateka yurubuga rwasuwe Gushoboza JavaScript. Imbuga nyinshi zikenera \ nJavaScript kubikorwa byazo. Ariko bararuhutse kandi barashobora gukoreshwa mubitero Gushoboza kuki. Cookies ni dosiye ntoya, bibitswe kubikoresho byawe. Urubuga rukoresha kuburugero kubika ububiko bwabakoresha. Ariko barashobora kandi gukoreshwa mugukusanya umukoresha kugiti cye amakuru. Igice cya gatatu kuki gihagarikwa. Kwemeza ikiganiro iyo \ nfunga mushakisha Kwemeza ikiganiro mugihe ufunze tab Fungura tab nshya mugihe tab ya nyuma ifunze aho gusohoka muri mushakisha Koresha ecran yose mugihe uzenguruka kurubuga niba ukanze buto yinyuma uzahava muburyo bwuzuye Amashusho Amashusho Urubuga Igishushanyo Ibikurikira Mbere Ubufasha Igenamiterere Indimi Porogaramu nyinshi Tanga amanota Indorerwamo Menya neza ko terefone yawe na TV byahujwe numuyoboro umwe wa Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Ihuza Wi-Fi Yaciwe Jenerali Ganira Kohereza Ibisubizo Inyigisho Nigute ushobora gukoresha? Kugenda Inzira nziza Guhagarara Kugabanya Imodoka Iterambere Icyerekezo Hagarika videwo mugihe ihuza \ nto intego yabuze Hisha porogaramu mugihe indorerwamo itangiye Icyerekezo cyo gukina Uburyo bw'indorerwamo Mugaragaza indorerwamo ya politiki yi banga Politiki Yibanga Gufasha Ibikoresho Reba ibikoresho bifasha indorerwamo Insanganyamatsiko y'amabara Umwijima Umucyo Imodoka Hitamo Ururimi hafi Amashusho Yoroheje Indorerwamo Igikoresho cyawe kigenewe kigomba kuba mumurongo umwe wa Wi-Fi nki gikoresho, kubera ko Indorerwamo ya Screen yohereza ecran yawe. Koresha ecran ya igikoresho cyawe hejuru ya Wi-Fi kuri mudasobwa yawe, ikaye cyangwa tableti. Urashobora kandi gukoresha igikoresho cyawe gishyushye (uburyo bwo guhuza) hanyuma ugahuza igikoresho cyawe na hoteri yawe. Fungura urubuga kubikoresho byawe. Mugusikana QR code ihuza ibice byoherejwe kandi indorerwamo iratangira. Nyamuneka umenye ko Indorerwamo ya Mirror ikora gusa mugihe washyizeho neza. Indorerwamo ya ecran yohereza ecran yawe, ariko ntabwo ibimenyetso byamajwi yibikoresho byawe. Niba uhuye nikibazo twandikire. Ishimire neza kandi yujuje ubuziranenge \ nta gutinda Ihuze nibikoresho byose byubwenge kandi wishimire \ nshow kuri ecran iyariyo yose Ishimire muri porogaramu yihariye ya mushakisha idafite aho igarukira Gushiraho Mugaragaza Igikoresho gishyushye Kode ya Scan Inkunga Kurangiza Politiki Yacu Kurinda ubuzima bwawe ni ngombwa kuri twe. Turizera ko amagambo akurikira azagufasha kumva uburyo dukorana namakuru yihariye, ushobora rimwe na rimwe kuduha ukoresheje interineti (Google Play platform). \ N \ n Muri rusange. ntabwo dukusanya PII iyo ari yo yose iyo ukuyemo porogaramu za Android. Kugirango ugaragare neza, ntidusaba abakiriya gusura ibyo dusaba, nta nubwo dufite Seriveri yo kubika PII nkiyi. \ N \ nIcyerekezo cya Mirroring ikoresha Facebook nkitanga amatangazo. Facebook irashaka kwerekana amatangazo akureba. Kubindi bisobanuro nyamuneka sura \ nhttps: //m.facebook.com/ad/ad_choices. raporo. PII dushobora kubona muri wewe muribwo buryo bugarukira gusa ku izina ryawe, aderesi imeri hamwe nigisubizo cyawe gusa. \ N \ nMu bihe byavuzwe haruguru, turemeza ko wowe PII uzakoreshwa gusa kuvugana nawe no kunoza serivisi zacu. Ntabwo tuzigera dukoresha amakuru nkaya (urugero: izina ryawe hamwe na aderesi imeri_ kubindi bikorwa byose, nko kurushaho kwamamaza ibicuruzwa byacu, cyangwa guhishura amakuru yawe kubandi bantu kugirango bunguke mubucuruzi. \ N \ nIbikwiye kumenyekana ko niba cyangwa kutatwoherereza ibitekerezo byawe cyangwa raporo yibikorwa nigikorwa cyubushake rwose kubwicyemezo cyawe.Niba ufite impungenge zuko PII yawe ikoreshwa nabi, cyangwa niba ushaka ibisobanuro birambuye kuri politiki yi banga ryacu nicyo bivuze, nyamuneka utwandikire. kuri screenmirroring.feedback@gmail.com, tuzagerageza gutanga ibisubizo byumvikana kubibazo byawe mugihe gikwiye. Nyamuneka andika ibitekerezo byawe Sisitemu Amakuru yawe azoherezwa muri Screen Mirroring Department Department Ohereza tanga ibitekerezo Imeri itemewe yatanzwe Reba umurongo wa enterineti andika hanoâ€¦ Injira imeri yawe (ubishaka) Ishimire Porogaramu? Gereranya uburambe bwawe ukoresheje Mugaragaza \ nIkosa rya Porogaramu. Ntabwo ari ubu Igitekerezo: Icyitegererezo: Ikirango: OS verisiyo: Uruganda: RAM: Ohereza ubutumwa Hitamo Ishusho Ikigo gifasha Terefone yanjye igumye kuri "Guhuza" mugihe uhujwe na TV. Byankoreye mbere, ariko 
ntibikora ubu. Irerekana ko igikoresho cyanjye 
kidashyigikiwe. TV yanjye ni TV ishaje kandi ntabwo 
ishyigikiye wi-fi. Ishusho kuri TV ni umukara, ariko amajwi arashobora kumvikana. Kwihuza bizahagarikwa nyuma 
yigihe gito. Ese amakuru yanjye bwite cyangwa amakuru yimikorere afite umutekano rwose? Ongera utangire Wi-Fi ya terefone yubwenge urebe niba ihuza ryagenze neza. Zimya TV hanyuma ukureho umugozi wamashanyarazi kuri sock nayo. Tegereza umunota 1 hanyuma utangire TV. Gabanya intera iri hagati ya terefone yawe na TV. Fata hafi. Niba yarakoze mbere, byanze bikunze irashobora kongera gukoreshwa. Ibibazo byinshi byihuza birashobora gukemurwa no gutangira ibikoresho. Gusa ongera utangire terefone yawe na TV, ukurikize inzira isanzwe kugirango ugerageze. Ibi bivuze ko terefone yawe ubwayo idashyigikira imikorere ya ecran ya ecran. Urashobora gukoresha XCast kugirango ushire amashusho, amajwi nifoto kuri TV. Hamwe na XCast, urashobora gukora ibindi ukoresheje terefone yawe mugihe utera TV. Niba TV yawe ishyigikiye interineti ya HDMI, turagusaba ko wagura imashini yakira yo kwerekana ecran. Nka Chromecast, Anycast nibindi. Ibirimo bimwe birimo kurinda uburenganzira kandi ntibishobora kugaragara kubikoresho byabandi, nka Netflix, Disney Plus nibindi. Urashobora gukuramo videwo cyangwa ukareba ibikoresho bimwe kurindi porogaramu kugirango ugerageze. Urashobora gufungura Smart Connect mugace ka Wi-Fi yawe. Bizashakisha imiyoboro myiza ya Wi-fi buri gihe, kandi ihore ihuza inyuma. Nyamuneka reba neza ko Wi-Fi ya terefone igendanwa na TV ari SAM n'ikimenyetso cyiza. Ntabwo tuzakurikirana cyangwa gukusanya amakuru kuri wewe na terefone yawe igendanwa. Urashobora guta ecran yawe nta mpungenge. Sisitemu irashobora kukuburira ko hari ikibazo cyumutekano mbere yo kwerekana ecran. Ibi nibisanzwe byibutsa, bizaba WI-FI MIRA CAST SHAKA Shyiramo Igitabo Menya neza ko terefone yawe na TV byahujwe \ nto umuyoboro umwe wa Wi-Fi.
